input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "PicturesOnGold"
Reference Product Name: "Custom Photo Engraved Bracelet"
Reference Product Description:
This beautiful bracelet allows for a adjustable size - to fit all wrists!
Held together by a rounded box chain, with a round photo charm attached at the center.
This new stylish bracelet is perfect for any gift or occasion.
All photos are 100% lifetime guaranteed.
Item can be engraved with message, names, dates or monogram.
Engraving doesn't delay your shipment.
Picture Engraving is scratch and water resistant and included in the price.
One Size Fits All

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Zales Sterling Silver Engravable Photo Rope-Textured Frame Pendant'
  - Name='Zales Couple's Gemstone Interlocking Hearts Bracelet (2 Stones)'
  - Name='Zales Tungsten ID Plate Link Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Photo Projection Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Projection Photo Bracelet in Sterling Silver'
  - Name='Things Remembered Holiday Jewelry Gift Box'
  - Name='Brook and York Men's Engravable Lord's Prayer Bracelet'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Diamond Infinity Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Projection Photo Bracelet'
  - Name='18K Gold Minimalist Photo Projection Bracelet'
  - Name='Children's Colored Stone ID Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Projection Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Photo Projection Sparkling Chain Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Printed & Text Engraved Rhinestone Bracelet'
  - Name='Minimalist Photo Projection Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Projection Braided Rope Bracelet'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Custom Photo Projection Heart Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Photo Projection Rope Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Charm Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Heart Crystal Bracelet'
  - Name='14K Gold Custom Photo Engraved Couple Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Projection Rope Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Photo Circle Photo Projection Bracelet'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales Sterling Silver Engravable Photo Rope-Textured Frame Pendant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is an engravable photo jewelry piece, but it's a pendant rather than a bracelet, so the construction and silhouette differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales Couple's Gemstone Interlocking Hearts Bracelet (2 Stones)
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a bracelet, but it does not appear to feature photo engraving or customization with a photo for personalization features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales Tungsten ID Plate Link Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: It is a bracelet with potential for engraving but is focused on ID plate style, not photo engraving or photo charm.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Photo Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Directly in the same category as the reference: a bracelet that can be personalized with a photo.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Custom Photo Projection Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bracelet utilizing custom photo, but uses projection rather than direct engraving—still highly relevant but a slightly different mechanism.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Projection Photo Bracelet in Sterling Silver
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to above, uses photo in a projection style within a bracelet, strong relevance based on function and form.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Things Remembered Holiday Jewelry Gift Box
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This item appears to be packaging/gift box, not a jewelry item or bracelet.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brook and York Men's Engravable Lord's Prayer Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Engravable bracelet, but with text focus (prayer) and no photo element.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Diamond Infinity Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bracelet but no photo or engraving customization implied, and different design focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Custom Projection Photo Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bracelet with the ability to project a custom photo, serving the same core purpose as the reference with a variation in display method.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 18K Gold Minimalist Photo Projection Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Photo bracelet with projection mechanism and minimalist style—very close in core function and silhouette, but luxe material and projection method differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Children's Colored Stone ID Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A children's ID bracelet with colored stones, but not a photo or engravable charm product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Photo Projection Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bracelet uses projection style for personalized photo, fitting the core use case and customer appeal despite the photo display style difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Custom Photo Projection Sparkling Chain Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Personalized bracelet with photo projection, similar to the reference except for photo mechanism and sparkling chain style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Photo Printed & Text Engraved Rhinestone Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Photo bracelet with both photo printing and text engraving, nearly identical in function and major features to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Minimalist Photo Projection Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Minimalist bracelet with custom photo via projection, very close but differing in display technique.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Photo Projection Braided Rope Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Photo bracelet with personalization and unique construction (braided rope), highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Custom Photo Projection Heart Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Custom photo bracelet with heart shape and projection method, slightly distinct silhouette but functionally relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Custom Photo Projection Rope Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bracelet with custom photo (projection) and rope construction, delivers the same core value as the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Photo Charm Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Matching the reference almost exactly; a bracelet with a personalized photo charm in the core construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Photo Heart Crystal Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bracelet with personalized photo in a heart crystal charm format—very similar in function and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 14K Gold Custom Photo Engraved Couple Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Essentially the same product as the reference with photo engraving on a bracelet, only material differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Photo Projection Rope Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Photo bracelet with personalized projection and rope construction—very similar purpose with a different photo display method.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Custom Photo Circle Photo Projection Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bracelet uses a circular projection photo format—same use case, slightly varied technology.
